description: This file defines API route handlers for managing 'notes' in a FastAPI application, including endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes.

methods.name: List[Note] list_notes(repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository))
methods.description: Returns all notes from the repository.

methods.name: Note create_note(payload: NoteCreate, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository))
methods.description: Creates a new note with provided payload.

methods.name: Note get_note( note_id: UUID = Path(..., description="UUID of the note"), repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its UUID.

methods.name: Note update_note( note_id: UUID = Path(..., description="UUID of the note"), payload: NoteUpdate = ..., repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by UUID.

methods.name: JSONResponse delete_note( note_id: UUID = Path(..., description="UUID of the note"), repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by UUID.

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note(payload: NoteCreate, repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository)) -> Note:$/

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: UUID = Path(..., description="UUID of the note"), repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: UUID = Path(..., description="UUID of the note"), repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: UUID = Path(..., description="UUID of the note"), payload: NoteUpdate = ..., repo: NotesRepository = Depends(get_repository), )
